sentences.sContent: After the morning’s good deeds he deserved a rest.
sentences.sCn: 上午做了好事之后，他理应休息一下。

sentences.sContent: She tried to strangle her baby and her lover helped her finish the evil deed .
sentences.sCn: 她试图掐死自己的宝宝，她的情人帮着完成了这个罪恶的勾当。

phrases.pCn: 信托书，委托书；信托契约
v. 产生效果；付诸行动

words.tran: 文件箱；契据文书保险箱

trans.tranCn: 行为， 行动； 转让契约、 证书
trans.tranOther: something someone does, especially something that is very good or very bad
